title: @Wuks   Dam you :^)

embed.description: Alright lads, for those of you who have been on forums for a while will now this post, and even though it was created last year it was well alive and kicking until forums got shut, so i'm bringing it back to life here.

body: You got my hopes up... you could have at least posted in the other count thread :^(
